title: Jupiter Token Submission Guide
description: How to make custom tokens tradable on Jupiter

steps.title: Create Liquidity Pool
steps.description: Create actual liquidity pool on Raydium or Orca
steps.action: Use Raydium UI or SDK to create pool with initial liquidity

steps.title: Submit to Jupiter
steps.action: Create PR to https://github.com/jup-ag/token-list with token metadata

steps.title: Wait for Indexing
steps.description: Jupiter needs to index the new token
steps.action: Usually takes 24-48 hours after pool creation

steps.title: Alternative: Use Strict List
steps.action: Add strictList=false to quote requests for new tokens

immediateWorkaround.title: Immediate Testing Workaround
immediateWorkaround.description: For testing purposes, use well-known devnet tokens
